7.title: Requests per Second
7.query: timeseries { sum(dt.service.request.count), value.A = avg(dt.service.request.count, scalar: true) }, filter: { matchesValue(entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name"), "frontend") }

9.title: failed request
9.query: timeseries { failure_count = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, scalar: true), failure_count.trend_line = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count) }

10.title: Total Request
10.query: timeseries { count = sum(dt.service.request.count, scalar: true), count.trend_line = sum(dt.service.request.count) }

11.title: Error Rate

14.title: Detailed Overview
14.query:
timeseries totalRequests = sum(dt.service.request.count),
           failedRequests = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count),
           p99ResponseTime = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 99), // Added P99
           p95ResponseTime = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 95),
           p50ResponseTime = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 50), // Added P50 (Average/Median)
    by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd serviceName = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd errorRate = arrayAvg(failedRequests) / arrayAvg(totalRequests) * 100
| fields serviceName,
         errorRate,
         totalRequests = arraySum(totalRequests), // Changed to arraySum for total requests in time frame
         p50ResponseTime = arrayAvg(p50ResponseTime),
         p95ResponseTime = arrayAvg(p95ResponseTime),
         p99ResponseTime = arrayAvg(p99ResponseTime)
| sort errorRate desc
| limit 20

15.title: SLO Compliance(%)
15.query:
timeseries 
  avgRespTime = avg(dt.service.request.response_time),
  total = sum(dt.service.request.count),
  failures = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)
, by: { dt.entity.service }

| fieldsAdd 
    service_name = entityName(dt.entity.service),
    total_sum = arraySum(total),
    failures_sum = arraySum(failures),
    avgRespTime_ms = arrayAvg(avgRespTime) / 1000

| fieldsAdd 
    latency_slo = if(condition: isNull(avgRespTime_ms), then: null, else: if(condition: avgRespTime_ms > 500, then: 0, else: 100)),
    error_slo = if(condition: total_sum > 0, then: 100 * ((total_sum - failures_sum) / total_sum), else: 0)

| fields service_name, latency_slo, error_slo

16.title: Services Overview
16.query:
timeseries 
  totalRequests = sum(dt.service.request.count),
  failedRequests = sum(dt.service.request.failure_count),
  p50ResponseTime = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 50)
, by: { dt.entity.service }

| fieldsAdd 
    serviceName = entityName(dt.entity.service),
    avgResponseTime_ms = arrayAvg(p50ResponseTime) / 1000,
    totalRequests_sum = arraySum(totalRequests),
    failedRequests_avg = arrayAvg(failedRequests),
    totalRequests_avg = arrayAvg(totalRequests)

| fieldsAdd 
    req_per_sec = totalRequests_sum / 86400,  // Replace with your actual timeframe in seconds
    error_pct = if(condition: totalRequests_avg > 0, then: failedRequests_avg / totalRequests_avg * 100, else: 0)

| fields serviceName, avgResponseTime_ms, req_per_sec, error_pct
| sort error_pct desc
| limit 20
